directions: Drain lychees, reserving syrup, then purée lychees, cream of coconut, 1/4 cup syrup, and 2 1/2 tablespoons lime juice in a blender until smooth. Freeze in ice cream maker.
While sorbet is churning, toss together mango, zest, and remaining lime juice to taste (1/2 to 1 tablespoon).
Serve scoops of sorbet over mango slices.
ingredients: 1/2 cup well-stirred sweetened cream of coconut (preferably Coco López brand; not coconut milk or coconut cream)
1 firm-ripe large mango (1 lb), peeled and sliced
1 teaspoon finely grated fresh lime zest
Special equipment: an ice cream maker
title: Lychee Coconut Sorbet with Mango and Lime
